MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Adverb: A word or phrase that modifies an adjective, verb, or other adverb or a word group, expressing a relation of place, time, circumstance, manner, cause, degree, etc.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Used to say that you wish something were not true, or that something sad, bad, or regrettable has happened or is the case.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 表示遗憾、不走运或不希望某事发生，通常指不好的或令人沮丧的情况。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Unfortunately, we're unable to accept your application at this time.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 不幸的是，我们目前无法接受您的申请。
